title: Legal Resistance to Immigration Detention Expansion
description: Document the legal resistance efforts against immigration detention expansion, focusing on court cases, advocacy groups, and policy outcomes.
research_areas: What are the specific dates and actors involved in Legal Resistance to Immigration Detention Expansion?
What are the financial amounts and policy changes related to this investigation?
How does this connect to broader institutional capture patterns?
What documentation and sources verify these timeline events?
source_requirements: Government documents, financial records, policy communications
pdf_source: The Rise and Fall of Alligator Alcatraz_ Florida's Controversial Immigration Detention Experiment.pdf
